title: FS: T206 card of Ed Abbaticchio (brown sleeves) SGC 60

posts.post_title: FS: T206 card of Ed Abbaticchio (brown sleeves) SGC 60
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have a T206 card of Ed Abbaticchio (brown sleeves) for sale. It is graded SGC 60. The price of the card is $140 and that includes insured shipping. I do not have PayPal. I will accept a US Postal money order (preferred) or a personal check. There are scans below. I will ship out the card on the same day that I receive your payment.

To buy the card, send me an E-mail at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
